package.name: musextputils
package.descrip: A library package of generically useful PostgreSQL and xTuple ERP functions and such from Muse Systems. Based on the Muse Systems 'muse_syscore' module.
package.pkgnotes: A library package of generically useful PostgreSQL and xTuple ERP functions and such from Muse Systems. Based on the Muse Systems 'muse_syscore' module.

prerequisite.name: PostgreSQL Database Version
prerequisite.query: SELECT CASE WHEN (current_setting('server_version_num'))::integer >= 90500 THEN true ELSE false END;
prerequisite.message: This package must be installed against PostgreSQL Database Version 9.5 or later.

prerequisite.name: PostgreSQL hstore Module Installed
prerequisite.query: SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM pg_extension WHERE extname = 'hstore');
prerequisite.message: The PostgreSQL contrib module "hstore" must be installed prior to loading this package.

prerequisite.name: xTuple ERP Version
prerequisite.query: WITH version AS ( SELECT (SELECT substring(fetchMetricText('ServerVersion'),E'^([[:digit:]]+)\..*'))::integer as major_version, (SELECT substring(fetchMetricText('ServerVersion'),E'^[[:digit:]]+\.([[:digit:]]+)\..*$'))::integer as minor_version, (SELECT substring(fetchMetricText('ServerVersion'),E'^[[:digit:]]+\.[[:digit:]]+\.([[:digit:]]+)'))::integer as patch_version ) SELECT (major_version = 4 AND minor_version = 10 AND patch_version >= 0) OR (major_version = 4 AND minor_version > 10) OR (major_version > 4) FROM version;
prerequisite.message: This package must be installed against xTuple ERP version 4.10.0 or later. This package has only been tested against version 4.10.0 and may not work in later version without updating.
